card.name: Aegis of the Gods
card.property: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Athreos cares little for the other gods' conflict with mortals. He is concerned only with safe passage for the dead.

card.name: Ajani's Presence
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Any number of target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

card.name: Akroan Mastiff
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when many of the soldiers who guarded Akros were called away, its safety was never in doubt.

card.name: Armament of Nyx
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike as long as it's an enchantment. Otherwise, prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature. (A creature with double strike deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: Banishing Light
card.property: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)

card.name: Dawnbringer Charioteers
card.property: Flying, lifelink Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Dawnbringer Charioteers, put a +1/+1 counter on Dawnbringer Charioteers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nyx may belong to the gods, but the skies of Theros are ours."

card.name: Deicide
card.property: Exile target enchantment. If the exiled card is a God card, search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them, then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Dictate of Heliod
card.property: Flash Creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In our war Heliod gave mortals some favor, yet other times he withheld aid. Are we still no more than game pieces to him?" —Polyxene the Doubter

card.name: Eagle of the Watch
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even from miles away, I could see our eagles circling. That's when I gave the command to pick up the pace. I knew we were needed at home." —Kanlos, Akroan captain

card.name: Eidolon of Rhetoric
card.property: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the soul of a philosopher who died of starvation contemplating the universe.

card.name: Font of Vigor
card.property: {2} {W}, Sacrifice Font of Vigor: You gain 7 life.

card.name: Godsend
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Whenever equipped creature blocks or becomes blocked by one or more creatures, you may exile one of those creatures. Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as a card exiled with Godsend. Equip {3}

card.name: Harvestguard Alseids
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Harvestguard Alseids or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all shields are forged of iron or bronze.

card.name: Lagonna-Band Trailblazer
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Lagonna-Band Trailblazer, put a +1/+1 counter on Lagonna-Band Trailblazer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Go forth with honor, return with glory.

card.name: Launch the Fleet
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Until end of turn, any number of target creatures each gain "Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking."

card.name: Leonin Iconoclast
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Leonin Iconoclast, destroy target enchantment creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stars belong in the night sky. This is our world, and we are our own masters."

card.name: Mortal Obstinacy
card.property: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice Mortal Obstinacy. If you do, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Nyx-Fleece Ram
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gods are fascinated by innocence, perhaps because it's a quality they themselves lack.

card.name: Oppressive Rays
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {3}. Activated abilities of enchanted creature cost {3} more to activate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Battle of Pharagax Bridge, the Champion spent many months among the leonin of Oreskos. She found that they were quick to take offense, not because they were thin-skinned, but because they were always eager for a fight. —The Theriad

card.name: Phalanx Formation
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {1}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Any number of target creatures each gain double strike until end of turn. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: Quarry Colossus
card.property: When Quarry Colossus enters the battlefield, put target creature into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library, where X is the number of Plains you control.

card.name: Reprisal
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A tiny flame is enough to dispel the night." —Elspeth

card.name: Sightless Brawler
card.property: Bestow {4}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Sightless Brawler can't attack alone. Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and can't attack alone.

card.name: Skybind
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Skybind or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, exile target nonenchantment permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Skyspear Cavalry
card.property: Flying Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pray her spear reaches you first. Her griffin is less kind.

card.name: Stonewise Fortifier
card.property: {4} {W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Stonewise Fortifier by target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ephara taught some mortals to feel every vein in marble as though it flows with their own blood.

card.name: Supply-Line Cranes
card.property: Flying When Supply-Line Cranes enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are trained from hatching to deliver aid where it is needed most.

card.name: Tethmos High Priest
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tethmos High Priest, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is tyranny. Like all tyranny, it must be opposed."

card.name: Aerial Formation
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Any number of target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Battlefield Thaumaturge
card.property: Each instant and sorcery spell you cast costs {1} less to cast for each creature it targets. Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Battlefield Thaumaturge, Battlefield Thaumaturge gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Cloaked Siren
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That is not the voice of the wind singing on the stones." —Callaphe the mariner

card.name: Countermand
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The physical pain was nothing compared to the agony in his mind.

card.name: Crystalline Nautilus
card.property: Bestow {3}{U}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) When Crystalline Nautilus becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it. Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

card.name: Dakra Mystic
card.property: {U}, {T}: Each player reveals the top card of their library. You may put the revealed cards into their owners' graveyards. If you don't, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Choices are rarely as simple as they seem.

card.name: Daring Thief
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Daring Thief becomes untapped, you may exchange control of target nonland permanent you control and target permanent an opponent controls that shares a card type with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honesty is the first casualty of war.

card.name: Dictate of Kruphix
card.property: Flash At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge is cruel. It will break your heart and test your allegiances. Are you certain you want this curse?"

card.name: Font of Fortunes
card.property: {1} {U}, Sacrifice Font of Fortunes: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drink deep, and your thoughts will flow freely.

card.name: Godhunter Octopus
card.property: Godhunter Octopus can't attack unless defending player controls an enchantment or an enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will match Thassa drop for drop and show a god what true power is." —Kiora

card.name: Hour of Need
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {1}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Exile any number of target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 4/4 blue Sphinx creature token with flying.

card.name: Hubris
card.property: Return target creature and all Auras attached to it to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wish to learn of Nyx? Very well." —Phenax, god of deception

card.name: Hypnotic Siren
card.property: Bestow {5}{U}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flying You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Interpret the Signs
card.property: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Draw cards equal to that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Kiora's Dismissal
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {U} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Return any number of target enchantments to their owners' hands.

card.name: Pin to the Earth
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -6/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mortal strength, like mortal hope, is so easily crushed." —Thassa, god of the sea

card.name: Polymorphous Rush
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {1}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Choose a creature on the battlefield. Any number of target creatures you control each become a copy of that creature until end of turn.

card.name: Pull from the Deep
card.property: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Pull from the Deep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ideas, not stones, form the true foundation of Meletis.

card.name: Riptide Chimera
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Rise of Eagles
card.property: Create two 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature tokens with flying. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An offering to the sea brings an insight from the stars.

card.name: Sage of Hours
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Sage of Hours, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Remove all +1/+1 counters from Sage of Hours: For each five counters removed this way, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Scourge of Fleets
card.property: When Scourge of Fleets enters the battlefield, return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.

card.name: Sigiled Starfish
card.property: {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kruphix hid the most dire prophecies about humankind where humans would never find them and tritons wouldn't care to read them.

card.name: Thassa's Devourer
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Thassa's Devourer or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When mortals claim there are places Thassa cannot reach, the sea god laughs.

card.name: Thassa's Ire
card.property: {3} {U}: You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sailor had never seen a god before. Now she had gazed upon Thassa. Shortly she would see Athreos, and then she would meet Erebos.

card.name: Triton Cavalry
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Cavalry, you may return target enchantment to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tritons broke the surface, and the Nyxborn broke ranks.

card.name: Triton Shorestalker
card.property: Triton Shorestalker can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who will miss you, drywalker? A wife? A child? Perhaps they will blame the sea for your fate, and teach future generations to stay far away from it."

card.name: War-Wing Siren
card.property: Flying Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets War-Wing Siren, put a +1/+1 counter on War-Wing Siren.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once she sang sailors to their doom. Now she leads them to glory.

card.name: Whitewater Naiads
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Whitewater Naiads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stand against the crash of the river's rapids and you will know the power of the naiads.

card.name: Agent of Erebos
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Agent of Erebos or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Erebos's minions hunt the Returned and warn those who consider the same folly.

card.name: Aspect of Gorgon
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My adopted children are loved no less." —Pharika, god of affliction

card.name: Bloodcrazed Hoplite
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Bloodcrazed Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Bloodcrazed Hoplite, remove a +1/+1 counter from target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Brain Maggot
card.property: When Brain Maggot enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until Brain Maggot leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Cast into Darkness
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-0 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In desperation the soldier prayed to Phenax, begging for the power to cheat the gorgon's gaze.

card.name: Cruel Feeding
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{B} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Any number of target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Dictate of Erebos
card.property: Flash Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I take no pleasure in your suffering, but it is necessary. Once you accept your fate you'll find eternity more tolerable."

card.name: Doomwake Giant
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Doomwake Giant or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crippling fear precedes it. A foul stench accompanies it. Death follows in its wake.

card.name: Dreadbringer Lampads
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Dreadbringer Lampads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Extinguish All Hope
card.property: Destroy all nonenchantment creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phenax offers the hope of life, while Pharika grants the solace of death. Between them stands Erebos, who promises nothing but eternity.

card.name: Feast of Dreams
card.property: Destroy target enchanted creature or enchantment creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We gave the gods the power to war against us. It is time we took that power back."

card.name: Felhide Petrifier
card.property: Deathtouch Other Minotaur creatures you control have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's common practice among minotaurs to collect the heads of their victims as trophies. Sometimes the trophies prove more than ornamental.

card.name: Font of Return
card.property: {3} {B}, Sacrifice Font of Return: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drink deep, and death will recoil from you.

card.name: Gnarled Scarhide
card.property: Bestow {3}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Gnarled Scarhide can't block. Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and can't block.

card.name: Grim Guardian
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Grim Guardian or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Occasionally the living wander to the Rivers, but the wardens of Athreos ensure that only the dead pass.

card.name: King Macar, the Gold-Cursed
card.property: Inspired — Whenever King Macar, the Gold-Cursed becomes untapped, you may exile target creature. If you do, create a colorless artifact token named Gold. It has "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Master of the Feast
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any pleasure, when taken to excess, becomes torment. It's a formula that demons have perfected.

card.name: Nightmarish End
card.property: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To think some believe it peaceful to die in one's sleep." —Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

card.name: Nyx Infusion
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's an enchantment. Otherwise, it gets -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A balm or a poison depending on how it is administered, and to whom.

card.name: Pharika's Chosen
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The serpents' dens built into statues of Pharika serve not only to consecrate her temples, but as a hidden line of defense.

card.name: Returned Reveler
card.property: When Returned Reveler dies, each player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flesh is dead and the life forgotten, but old habits persist.

card.name: Ritual of the Returned
card.property: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a black Zombie creature token. Its power is equal to that card's power and its toughness is equal to that card's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mask forged to avenge a death forgotten.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hulk rose from the sea and loomed over the Champion. Pinned beneath the twisting, rotted planks of wood was the body of Kaliaros, the helmsman of her former crew, and beside him the captain, Photine. —The Theriad

card.name: Silence the Believers
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{B} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Exile any number of target creatures and all Auras attached to them.

card.name: Spiteful Blow
card.property: Destroy target creature and target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a fool takes Phenax at his word. What do you expect from a god born of lies and betrayal?" —Verenes, priest of Iroas

card.name: Squelching Leeches
card.property: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leeches are sacred to followers of Pharika for drawing poison from a wound, but feared by everyone else for drawing blood from the flesh.

card.name: Thoughtrender Lamia
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Thoughtrender Lamia or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some predators can sense fear in their prey, but the lamia is drawn to madness.

card.name: Tormented Thoughts
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target player discards a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all nightmares can be escaped by waking." —Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

card.name: Worst Fears
card.property: You control target player during that player's next turn. Exile Worst Fears. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elspeth feared that her trespass into Nyx would not go unanswered.

card.name: Akroan Line Breaker
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Line Breaker, Akroan Line Breaker gets +2/+0 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The enemies' shields are the first to shatter, and their battle line is never far behind.

card.name: Bearer of the Heavens
card.property: When Bearer of the Heavens dies, destroy all permanents at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To hold the heavens from the earth is no curse, but a titanic responsibility.

card.name: Bladetusk Boar
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deathbellow Canyon is home to minotaurs and many other creatures that share a love for the taste of human flesh.

card.name: Blinding Flare
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {R} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Any number of target creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Cyclops of Eternal Fury
card.property: Creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The anger that festers inside this one is contagious." —Anthousa of Setessa

card.name: Dictate of the Twin Gods
card.property: Flash If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Iroas and Mogis are as different in appearance as they are in personality.

card.name: Eidolon of the Great Revel
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Flamespeaker's Will
card.property: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice Flamespeaker's Will. If you do, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Flurry of Horns
card.property: Create two 2/3 red Minotaur creature tokens with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A minotaur does not distinguish between human, satyr, and triton. They are all meat.

card.name: Font of Ire
card.property: {3} {R}, Sacrifice Font of Ire: It deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drink deep, and find your vengeance fulfilled.

card.name: Forgeborn Oreads
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Forgeborn Oreads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Forgeborn Oreads deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Purphoros shaped the oreads out of stray coals from his forge.

card.name: Gluttonous Cyclops

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cyclops had learned to never eat a shepherd. Instead he gently flung the "pit" aside to grow a new flock.

card.name: Harness by Force
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{R} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Gain control of any number of target creatures until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Knowledge and Power
card.property: Whenever you scry, you may pay {2}. If you do, Knowledge and Power deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Information is a powerful weapon." —Cymede, queen of Akros

card.name: Lightning Diadem
card.property: Enchant creature When Lightning Diadem enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fight for Keranos and for mortals. I see no contradiction."

card.name: Magma Spray
card.property: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ancient dragon Thraxes sleeps in Purphoros's sacred peak. When he stirs in dreams, so does the mountain.

card.name: Mogis's Warhound
card.property: Bestow {2}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Mogis's Warhound attacks each combat if able. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Champion and her companions marched through the night, but the battle was over before they arrived. In the middle of the carnage sat a solitary minotaur, lost in what seemed to the Champion to be thought. —The Theriad

card.name: Prophetic Flamespeaker
card.property: Double strike, trample Whenever Prophetic Flamespeaker deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire to destroy. Fire to create.

card.name: Riddle of Lightning
card.property: Choose any target. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Riddle of Lightning deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that permanent or player. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Rollick of Abandon
card.property: All creatures get +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Embrace every moment, for it could be your last." —Xenagos, god of revels

card.name: Rouse the Mob
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{R} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Any number of target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Satyr Hoplite
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Satyr Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Satyr Hoplite.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Xenagos has become what he once despised: a tyrant and an oppressor."

card.name: Sigiled Skink
card.property: Whenever Sigiled Skink attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The runes seem to come alive as it moves, rippling like slow flames across its scales.

card.name: Spawn of Thraxes
card.property: Flying When Spawn of Thraxes enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sparks from Purphoros's forge fill the belly of every dragon.

card.name: Spite of Mogis
card.property: Spite of Mogis deals damage to target creature equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Starfall
card.property: Starfall deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature is an enchantment, Starfall deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most brilliant stars are not born of Nyx." —Rhexenor, Akroan flamespeaker

card.name: Twinflame
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{R} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Choose any number of target creatures you control. For each of them, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it has haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Wildfire Cerberus
Bassara Tower Archer
card.property: Hexproof, reach

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Setessan warriors of Bassara Tower are known for their guerrilla tactics and skill with the bow. Interlopers into the Nessian Wood do not get far.

card.name: Colossal Heroics
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {1}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Any number of target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.

card.name: Consign to Dust
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Destroy any number of target artifacts and/or enchantments.

card.name: Desecration Plague
card.property: Destroy target enchantment or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods think of us as insects. Perhaps there is wisdom in that." —Perisophia the philosopher

card.name: Dictate of Karametra
card.property: Flash Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I refuse to let the folly of mortals endanger the home I made for them."

card.name: Eidolon of Blossoms
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Eidolon of Blossoms or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The emotional echoes of dryad gatherings attract lost souls.

card.name: Font of Fertility
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice Font of Fertility: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drink deep, and know the path to the heart of the wilds.

card.name: Golden Hind
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not yours to hunt, mortal. Be content with its beauty alone." —Nylea, god of the hunt

card.name: Goldenhide Ox
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Goldenhide Ox or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature must be blocked this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The temptation to take the ox's golden hide is as irresistible as it is fatal.

card.name: Heroes' Bane
card.property: Heroes' Bane enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {2}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on Heroes' Bane, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers' tales claim that hydras bite off their own heads to make themselves deadlier.

card.name: Humbler of Mortals
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Humbler of Mortals or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The anger of the gods multiplied in Nyx, and the land awoke in dark echoes of their rage.

card.name: Hydra Broodmaster
Kruphix's Insight
card.property: Reveal the top six cards of your library. Put up to three enchantment cards from among them into your hand and the rest of the revealed cards into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The horizon is tantalizing in both its uncertainty and its potential.

card.name: Market Festival
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional two mana in any combination of colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Commerce is always the basis for peace.

card.name: Nature's Panoply
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {2}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Choose any number of target creatures. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of them.

card.name: Nessian Game Warden
card.property: When Nessian Game Warden enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Forests you control. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Oakheart Dryads
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Oakheart Dryads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not know if the forest was different after they passed. But I know I was." —Ianthe, Setessan hunter

card.name: Pheres-Band Thunderhoof
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Pheres-Band Thunderhoof, put two +1/+1 counters on Pheres-Band Thunderhoof.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flesh and bone or star and shadow. It makes no difference to my club."

card.name: Pheres-Band Warchief
card.property: Vigilance, trample Other Centaur creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The renowned warchiefs of Pheres Band fight with the might of minotaurs and the sagacity of sphinxes.

card.name: Ravenous Leucrocota
card.property: Vigilance {6}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunger makes a leucrocota dangerous. A full belly makes it angry and dangerous.

card.name: Renowned Weaver
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice Renowned Weaver: Create a 1/3 green Spider enchantment creature token with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You think your weaving as beautiful as mine? Let me show you the true meaning of the craft."

card.name: Reviving Melody
card.property: Choose one or both — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Listen to my song, and you need never forge a golden mask to return to me."

card.name: Satyr Grovedancer
card.property: When Satyr Grovedancer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some of my kin dance for themselves, without greater purpose. Nylea gives me purpose, and with it strength."

card.name: Setessan Tactics
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {G} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Until end of turn, any number of target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain "{T}: This creature fights another target creature."

card.name: Solidarity of Heroes
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {1}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Choose any number of target creatures. Double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of them.

card.name: Spirespine
card.property: Bestow {4}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Spirespine blocks each combat if able. Enchanted creature gets +4/+1 and blocks each combat if able.

card.name: Strength from the Fallen
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Strength from the Fallen or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Swarmborn Giant
card.property: When you're dealt combat damage, sacrifice Swarmborn Giant. {4}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Swarmborn Giant is monstrous, it has reach.

card.name: Ajani, Mentor of Heroes
card.property: +1: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control. +1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Aura, creature, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. −8: You gain 100 life.

card.name: Athreos, God of Passage
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to white and black is less than seven, Athreos isn't a creature. Whenever another creature you own dies, return it to your hand unless target opponent pays 3 life.

card.name: Desperate Stand
card.property: Strive — This spell costs {R}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Any number of target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain first strike and vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the Akroan gates, hoplites revived the tactics of Kytheon Iora's infamous irregulars.

card.name: Disciple of Deceit
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Disciple of Deceit becomes untapped, you may discard a nonland card. If you do, search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fleetfeather Cockatrice
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying, deathtouch {5}{G}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Iroas, God of Victory
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to red and white is less than seven, Iroas isn't a creature. Creatures you control have menace. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to attacking creatures you control.

card.name: Keranos, God of Storms
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to blue and red is less than seven, Keranos isn't a creature. Reveal the first card you draw on each of your turns. Whenever you reveal a land card this way, draw a card. Whenever you reveal a nonland card this way, Keranos deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Kruphix, God of Horizons
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to green and blue is less than seven, Kruphix isn't a creature. You have no maximum hand size. If you would lose unspent mana, that mana becomes colorless instead.

card.name: Nyx Weaver
card.property: Reach At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. {1}{B}{G}, Exile Nyx Weaver: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Pharika, God of Affliction
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to black and green is less than seven, Pharika isn't a creature. {B}{G}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Its owner creates a 1/1 black and green Snake enchantment creature token with deathtouch.

card.name: Revel of the Fallen God
card.property: Create four 2/2 red and green Satyr creature tokens with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Xenagos has fallen, and the world grows dark without him. What can ever fill that darkness but our rage?" —Guruthes, disciple of Xenagos

card.name: Stormchaser Chimera
card.property: Flying {2}{U}{R}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. Stormchaser Chimera gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Underworld Coinsmith
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Underworld Coinsmith or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. {W}{B}, Pay 1 life: Each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Coins of the Underworld are shaped from clay funerary masks.

card.name: Armory of Iroas
card.property: Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From a distance the weapons look pristine, but in fact they are tarnished and dented, each as unique as the champion who carried it to battle.

card.name: Chariot of Victory
card.property: Equipped creature has first strike, trample, and haste. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest heroes are the first to stand, the first to take up arms, and the first to meet the enemy.

card.name: Deserter's Quarters
card.property: You may choose not to untap Deserter's Quarters during your untap step. {6}, {T}: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Deserter's Quarters remains tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Akros, the penalty for running from battle is one night's stay in the Deserter's Quarters.

card.name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blessed by the gods. Coveted by mortals. Beholden to neither.

card.name: Hall of Triumph
card.property: As Hall of Triumph enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heroes act without thought of glory or reward. Accolades are a consequence, not a goal.

card.name: Mana Confluence
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Five rivers encircle Theros, flowing with waters more ancient than the world itself.

card.name: Temple of Epiphany
card.property: Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Temple of Malady
card.property: Temple of Malady enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Malady enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {B} or {G}.
